evidence.claim: Delta Data Services uses AWS and Azure for their cloud infrastructure.
The company adheres to HIPAA standards for data protection.
Integration with X12 and EDI transaction sets is part of their services.
Delta Data Services supports FHIR standards for healthcare data exchange.
They utilize data platforms compatible with EHRs to enable efficient health data management.

icp.icp_reason: No strong evidence of significant X12 exchange usage or API automation focus identified.
